mapper.select: select total_annday, total_annday-annday_used as annday_rest from employee where emp_id = #{emp_id}
select work_day, holi_code from working_atti where work_day>curdate() and emp_id = ${emp_id} order by work_day asc

select holi_code, group_concat(holi_period separator ' / ') as dates from (select holi_period, holi_code, holi_cnt from holiday where emp_id = #{emp_id} and holi_state='0' order by holi_rid desc) as period group by holi_code;

select org_teamname as emp_dept, emp_id, emp_name, emp_posi, total_annday, annday_used, total_annday-annday_used as annday_rest, emp_join, emp_resi from employee e join organization o on e.emp_dept = o.org_teamcode
mapper.insert: insert into holiday(holi_period, holi_cnt, holi_res, holi_code, holi_evi, emp_id) values (#{holi_period}, #{holi_cnt}, #{holi_res}, #{holi_code}, #{holi_evi}, #{emp_id})
mapper.select: select holi_rid, holi_period, holi_cnt, holi_res, holi_code, case when holi_state= '0' then '대기' when holi_state ='1' then '승인' when holi_state ='2' then '거절' end as 'holi_state', holi_evi from holiday where emp_id=#{emp_id} order by holi_rid desc

select holi_rid, org_teamname, e.emp_id, emp_name, holi_period, holi_cnt, holi_res, holi_code, case when holi_state= '0' then '대기' when holi_state ='1' then '승인' when holi_state ='2' then '거절' end as 'holi_state', holi_evi from holiday h join employee e on e.emp_id =h.emp_id join organization o on e.emp_dept = o.org_teamcode order by holi_rid desc
select count(holi_rid) from holiday h join employee e on e.emp_id =h.emp_id join organization on e.emp_dept = org_teamcode;

select holi_rid, org_teamname, e.emp_id, emp_name, holi_period, holi_cnt, holi_res, holi_code, case when holi_state= '0' then '대기' end as 'holi_state', holi_evi from holiday h join employee e on e.emp_id =h.emp_id join organization o on e.emp_dept = o.org_teamcode where holi_state ='0' order by holi_rid asc
select count(holi_rid) from holiday h join employee e on e.emp_id =h.emp_id join organization o on e.emp_dept = o.org_teamcode where holi_state ='0'
mapper.update: update holiday set holi_state = '1' where holi_rid = #{holi_rid}
